current_issue: Audience fatigue - zero CTR, potential creative fatigue

creative_variations.headline: Real Men, Real Comfort
creative_variations.message: Don't just take our word for it. Hear from men who've made the switch to athleisure cooling underwear
creative_variations.rationale: Social proof to combat audience fatigue and improve CVR

creative_variations.headline: What's Holding You Back?
creative_variations.message: Say goodbye to sweat and discomfort. Upgrade to athleisure cooling underwear today
creative_variations.rationale: Emotional appeal to address pain points and create urgency

creative_variations.headline: Cooling Underwear for the Modern Man
creative_variations.message: Discover the benefits of athleisure cooling underwear: moisture-wicking, breathable, and comfortable
creative_variations.rationale: Highlighting key features and benefits to educate and engage the audience

testing_strategy: Launch all 3 variations simultaneously, $50/day each, rotate every 7 days
